title: Alan Moore: LXG - Nemo Books 1+2 (of 3|2013->|Dgtl-HR|Empire)
description:
Overview:

  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_League_of_Extraordinary_Gentlemen_(comic_volumes)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_League_of_Extraordinary_Gentlemen_(comic_volumes)</a>




Contains:

   Nemo - Heart of Ice        (2013) (Digital-1920)             (Empire)

   Nemo - The Roses of Berlin (2014) (Digital-HR)   (phillywilly-Empire)




   Both of these books were previously posted both in the Weeklies and separately (by
  <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/STFmaryville" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/STFmaryville</a>  + <a href=" http://thepiratebay.se/user/nemesis43" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://thepiratebay.se/user/nemesis43</a>
   respectively), but I'm guessing a substantial number of prospective readers missed
   them regardless simply because of the fairly nondescript titles. So, here they are
   again as a bundle. "Nemo" was announced as a trilogy, so there'll be one more such
   book to come, in turn followed by volume 4 in the main "League" continuity (IIRC).
